GitHub

Examples

using Filtration

Max volume case

Benyahia et al., 2013

In [Benyahia et al., 2013] :

tlim = (0,10); mlim = (0,10)
a = 1; b = 1; e = 1
p = [a, b, e]

f₁(m,p) = p[2] / (p[3] + m)
f₂(m,p) = -p[1] * m
g(m,p)  = 1 / (p[3] + m)
g₁(m,p) = g(m,p)
g₂(m,p) = -g(m,p)

model = Model(g₁, g₂, f₁, f₂, p, :max)
synthesis = Synthesis(model, tlim, mlim)
plot(synthesis, xlabel = "Time (t)", ylabel = "Mass (m)")

Cogan Chellamb, 2014

In [Cogan and Chellamb, 2014] and [Cogan and al., 2016] :

tlim = (0,40); mlim = (0,10)
a = 1; b = 1; e = 1
p = [a, b, e]

f₁(m,p) = p[2] / (p[3] + m)
f₂(m,p) = -(p[1] * m) / (p[3] + m)
g(m,p) = 1 / (p[3] + m)
g₁(m,p) = g(m,p)
g₂(m,p) = -g(m,p)

model = Model(g₁, g₂, f₁, f₂, p, :max)
synthesis = Synthesis(model, tlim, mlim)
plot(synthesis, xlabel = "Time (t)", ylabel = "Mass (m)")

Kalboussi et al., 2018

In [Kalboussi et al., 2018] :

tlim = (0, 0.25); mlim = (0,10)
a = 0.64; b = 490.07; d = 4125.6; e = 18.06
p = [a, b, d, e]

f₁(m,p) = p[2] / (p[4] + m)
f₂(m,p) = -(p[1] * p[3] * m) / (p[4] + m)
g(m,p) = p[3] / (p[4] + m)
g₁(m,p) = g(m,p)
g₂(m,p) = -g(m,p)

model = Model(g₁, g₂, f₁, f₂, p, :max)
synthesis = Synthesis(model, tlim, mlim)
plot(synthesis, xlabel = "Time (t)", ylabel = "Mass (m)")

Min energy example

Aichouche et al., 2020

In [Aichouche et al., 2020] : 

vlim = (0,50); mlim = (0,50)
ap = 0; bp = 1; cp = 0.16; dp = 3; Qp = 1
ar = 0.5; cr = 0.64; dr = 12; Qr = 2
p = [ap, bp, cp, dp, Qp, ar, cr, dr, Qr]

f₁(m,p) = -p[1]*m + p[2]
f₂(m,p) = -p[6]*m
g₁(m,p) = p[5]
g₂(m,p) = -p[9]
e₁(m,p) = p[3]*m + p[4]
e₂(m,p) = p[7]*m + p[8]

model = Model(e₁, e₂, f₁, f₂, g₁, g₂, p, :min; initial_guess = 20.)
synthesis = Synthesis(model, vlim, mlim)
plt = plot(synthesis, xlabel = "Volume (v)", ylabel = "Mass (m)")

Ellouze et al., 2023

In [Ellouze et al., 2023] :

vlim = (0, 0.015); mlim = (0, 0.05)
Jv = 2.71e-6; JBW = 5.66e-6;
C = 2184e-3; β = 1e-6; η = 4.9e-3
k1f = 2.0769; k2f = 0.0185; k1BW = 9.0551; k2BW = 0.0870
p = [Jv, JBW, C, β, η, k1f, k2f, k1BW, k2BW]

f₁(m,p) = p[3] * p[1] - p[3] * p[1] * p[4] * m
f₂(m,p) = -p[5] * m
g₁(m,p) = p[1]
g₂(m,p) = -p[2]
e₁(m,p) = p[6] * m + p[7]
e₂(m,p) = p[8] * m + p[9]

model = Model(e₁, e₂, f₁, f₂, g₁, g₂, p, :min; initial_guess = 20.)
synthesis = Synthesis(model, vlim, mlim)
plt = plot(synthesis, SL_nb_points = 10, xlabel = "Volume (v)", ylabel = "Mass (m)")
